General.Name: Workpoint Entertainment Public Company Limited
General.Description: Workpoint Entertainment Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the digital television broadcasting activities in Thailand. The company is also involved in the production of television programs and movies; editing and sound recording; and provision of entertainment event organizing and theater management services, as well as animation, computer graphics, concerts and plays, and event marketing businesses. In addition, it trades in goods and renders services. Further, the company engages in theatre space rental, artist management, and movie businesses. Workpoint Entertainment Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.
